item.title: SWN
item.description: score:120 Chances: The longer-term bullish case for natural gas rests on expanding U.S. exports, which could benefit Southwestern Energy (SWN). SWN delivered earnings and revenue surprises for the quarter ended December 2023, indicating positive performance. Risks: Front-month gas futures for March delivery rose, but supply and demand fluctuated, which could impact the business of SWN.
